# this is the build file for project 
# it is autogenerated by the xmake build system.
# do not edit by hand.

# project
cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 3.15.0)
cmake_policy(SET CMP0091 NEW)
project(core LANGUAGES CXX C)

# target
add_library(core STATIC "")
set_target_properties(core PROPERTIES OUTPUT_NAME "core")
set_target_properties(core PROPERTIES ARCHIVE_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY "${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/build/linux/x86_64/release")
target_include_directories(core PRIVATE
    src/core
    src/assets
    src/file
)
target_compile_options(core PRIVATE
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:C>:-m64>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:CXX>:-m64>
)
set_target_properties(core PROPERTIES CXX_EXTENSIONS OFF)
target_compile_features(core PRIVATE cxx_std_17)
if(MSVC)
    set_property(TARGET core PROPERTY
        MSVC_RUNTIME_LIBRARY "MultiThreaded$<$<CONFIG:Debug>:Debug>")
endif()
target_link_options(core PRIVATE
    -m64
)
target_sources(core PRIVATE
    src/core/arranger.cpp
    src/core/flags.cpp
    src/file/file.cpp
)

# target
add_executable(cs "")
set_target_properties(cs PROPERTIES OUTPUT_NAME "cs")
set_target_properties(cs PROPERTIES RUNTIME_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY "${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/build/linux/x86_64/release")
add_dependencies(cs core)
target_include_directories(cs PRIVATE
    src/core
    src/assets
    src/file
)
target_compile_options(cs PRIVATE
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:C>:-m64>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:CXX>:-m64>
)
set_target_properties(cs PROPERTIES CXX_EXTENSIONS OFF)
target_compile_features(cs PRIVATE cxx_std_17)
if(MSVC)
    set_property(TARGET cs PROPERTY
        MSVC_RUNTIME_LIBRARY "MultiThreaded$<$<CONFIG:Debug>:Debug>")
endif()
target_link_libraries(cs PRIVATE
    core
)
target_link_directories(cs PRIVATE
    build/linux/x86_64/release
)
target_link_options(cs PRIVATE
    -m64
)
target_sources(cs PRIVATE
    src/cmd/run.cpp
)

# target
add_executable(test "")
set_target_properties(test PROPERTIES OUTPUT_NAME "test")
set_target_properties(test PROPERTIES RUNTIME_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY "${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/build/linux/x86_64/release")
add_dependencies(test core)
target_include_directories(test PRIVATE
    src/core
    src/assets
    src/file
)
target_compile_options(test PRIVATE
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:C>:-m64>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:CXX>:-m64>
)
set_target_properties(test PROPERTIES CXX_EXTENSIONS OFF)
target_compile_features(test PRIVATE cxx_std_17)
if(MSVC)
    set_property(TARGET test PROPERTY
        MSVC_RUNTIME_LIBRARY "MultiThreaded$<$<CONFIG:Debug>:Debug>")
endif()
target_link_libraries(test PRIVATE
    core
)
target_link_directories(test PRIVATE
    build/linux/x86_64/release
)
target_link_options(test PRIVATE
    -m64
)
target_sources(test PRIVATE
    test/test.cpp
)
